meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being human.
meanings.sent1: Kindness and empathy are important aspects of humannesses.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her humannesses by helping the injured bird.
meanings.sent3: His sense of humannesses made him share his last cookie with his friend.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, our true humannesses shine through.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of humannesses in his painting.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or attributes that make someone human.
meanings.sent1: Resilience and compassion are key components of humannesses.
meanings.sent2: The novel explored the complexities of humannesses in a post-apocalyptic world.
meanings.sent3: Even robots can't replicate the uniqueness of humannesses.
meanings.sent4: Her humannesses shone brightly in moments of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The documentary delved into the diversity of humannesses across cultures.
